item.from: .*The server failed to respond with a valid HTTP response.*
item.to: The server failed to respond with a valid HTTP response. Try to use https protocol

item.from: .*unable to find valid certification path to requested target.*
item.to: Invalid SSL certificate. You can use 'Trust insecure registry' option (potentialy dangerous).
Unauthorized - Use the authentication and provide correct username and password
Operation is not allowed. Check your registry settings
